full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS NGAN SONG THAMS CAD YONGS SU SBYONG BA GZI BRJID KYI RGYAL PO'I BRTAG PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @148A *, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHINTAm GARBHA DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA DZA YA RAKshI TAS BSGYUR CING ZHUS, AA TZARYA RIN CHEN MCHOG GIS SKAD GSAR BCAD KYIS BCOS NAS GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,SLAD KYIS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DZI NA MI TRA DANG, LO TZTSA BA DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,@148B `SPAR 'DI DKA' BCU LUNG RTOGS SBYIN PA GNYIS, ,PHA MA NYE 'BREL GTZOS BYAS GSHIN DON DU, ,DMIGS TE RGYU SBYOR T'A LA GUNG SHOG GI ,KUN RIG GRVA TSANG GZI BRJID GLING DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE 'DIS PHA MA NYE 'BREL 'GRO KUN DANG, ,SPAR BRKOS MKHAN SOGS 'BREL THOGS MA LUS PA, ,NGAN SONG GNAS SU NAM YANG MI SKYE ZHING, ,RNAM PAR SNANG MDZAD GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,
